name: Widow
ability: On your 1st night, look at the Grimoire & choose a player: they are poisoned. 1 good player knows a Widow is in play.

legacy.firstNightReminder: Show the Grimoire to the Widow. The Widow points to a player who becomes poisoned. Wake a good player and show the Widow token.
